Verses: 1 yesukiristhuvin Apposthalanaagiya Pedhuru, Ponthu, Galaaththiyaa, Kappaththokkiyaa, Aasiyaa, Piththiniyaa Thesangalile Sidhariyirukkiravargalil,

2 pidhaavaagiya Dhevanudaiya Munnarivinpadiye, Aaviyaanavarin Parisuththamaakkudhalinaale, Keezhppadidhalukkum Yesukiristhuvinudaiya Raththam Thelikkappadudhalukkum Therindhukollappatta Paradhesigalukku Ezhudhugiradhaavadhu: Kirubaiyum Samaadhaanamum Ungalukkup Perugakkadavadhu.
3 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanukku Sthoththiram Undaavadhaaga;
4 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanukku Sthoththiram Undaavadhaaga;

5 kadaisikkaalaththile Velippada Aayaththamaakkappattirukkira Ratchippukku Edhuvaaga Visuvaasaththaik Kondu Dhevanudaiya Balaththinaale Kaakkappattirukkira Ungalukku Andhach Sudhandharam Paralogaththil Vaikkappattirukkiradhu.
6 idhile Neengal Migavum Sandhoshappadugireergal; Endraalum, Thunbappadavendiyadhu Avasiyamaanadhaal, Ippozhudhu Konjakkaalam Palavidhamaana Sodhanaigalinaale Thukkappadugireergal.

7 azhindhupogira Pon Akkiniyinaale Sodhikkappatum; Adhaippaarkkilum Adhiga Vilaiyerappetradhaayirukkira Ungal Visuvaasam Sodhikkappattu, Yesukiristhu Velippadumpodhu Ungalukkup Pukazhchchiyum Ganamum Magimaiyumundaagak Kaanappadum.

8 avarai Neengal Kaanaamalirundhum Avaridaththil Anbukoorugireergal; Ippozhudhu Avaraith Tharisiyaamalirundhum Avaridaththil Visuvaasam Vaiththu, Sollimudiyaadhadhum Magimaiyaal Niraindhadhumaayirukkira Sandhoshamullavargalaaik Kalikoorndhu,
9 ungal Visuvaasaththin Balanaagiya Aaththumaratchippai Adaigireergal.
10 ungalukku Undaana Kirubaiyaik Kuriththuth Theerkkadharisananjonna Theerkkadharisigal Indha Ratchippaikkuriththuk Karuththaai Aaraaindhu Parisodhanaipanninaargal;

11 thangalilulla Kiristhuvin Aaviyaanavar Kiristhuvukku Undaagum Paadugalaiyum, Avaigalukkup Pinvarum Magimaigalaiyum Munnariviththapodhu, Innakaalaththaik Kuriththaarenbadhaiyum, Andhak Kaalaththin Visesham Innadhenbadhaiyum Aaraaindhaargal.

12 thangalnimiththamalla, Namadhunimiththame Ivaigalaith Theriviththaargalendru Avargalukku Veliyaakkappattadhu, Paralogaththilirundhu Anuppappatta Parisuththa Aaviyinaale Ungalukkuch Suviseshaththaip Pirasangiththavargalaikkondu Ivaigal Ippozhudhu Ungalukku Arivikkappattu Varugiradhu; Ivaigalai Utruppaarkka Dhevathoodharum Aasaiyaayirukkiraargal.

13 aagaiyaal, Neengal Ungal Manadhin Araiyaik Kattikkondu, Thelindhapuththiyullavargalaayirundhu, Yesu Kiristhu Velippadumpodhu Ungalukku Alikkappadung Kirubaiyinmel Poorana Nambikkaiyullavargalaayirungal.
14 neengal Munne Ungal Ariyaamaiyinaale Kondirundha Ichchaigalinpadi Ini Nadavaamal, Keezhppadigira Pillaigalaayirundhu,
15 ungalai Azhaiththavar Parisuththaraayirukkiradhupola, Neengalum Ungal Nadakkaikalellaavatrileyum Parisuththaraayirungal.
16 naan Parisuththar, Aagaiyaal Neengalum Parisuththaraayirungal Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhe.

17 andriyum, Patchapaadhamillaamal Avanavanudaiya Kiriyaigalinpadi Niyaayantheerkkiravarai Neengal Pidhaavaagath Thozhudhukonduvarugirapadiyaal, Inge Paradhesigalaaich Sanjarikkumalavum Payaththudane Nadandhukollungal.
18 ungal Munnorgalaal Paarambariyamaai Neengal Anusariththu Vandha Veenaana Nadaththaiyinindru Azhivulla Vasthukkalaagiya Velliyinaalum Ponninaalum Meetkappadaamal,
19 kutramillaadha Maasatra Aattukkuttiyaagiya Kiristhuvin Vilaiyerappetra Raththaththinaale Meetkappatteergalendru Arindhirukkireergale.
20 avar Ulagaththotraththirku Munne Kurikkappattavaraayirundhu, Thamadhu Moolamaai Dhevanmel Visuvaasamaayirukkira Ungalukkaaga Indhak Kadaisikkaalangalil Velippattaar.
21 ungal Visuvaasamum Nambikkaiyum Dhevanmelirukkumpadi, Avarai Mariththorilirundhu Ezhuppi, Avarukku Magimaiyaik Koduththaar.

22 aagaiyaal Neengal Maayamatra Sagodhara Sinegamullavargalaagumpadi, Aaviyinaale Saththiyaththirkuk Keezhppadindhu, Ungal Aaththumaakkalaich Suththamaakkikkondavargalaayirukkirapadiyaal, Suththa Irudhayaththode Oruvariloruvar Ookkamaai Anbukoorungal;
23 azhivulla Viththinaale Alla, Endrendraikkum Nirkiradhum Jeevanulladhumaana Dhevavasanamaagiya Azhivillaadha Viththinaale Marubatiyum Jenippikkappattirukkireergale.
24 maamsamellaam Pullaippolavum, Manusharudaiya Magimaiyellaam Pullin Poovaippolavumirukkiradhu; Pul Ularndhadhu, Adhin Poovum Udhirndhadhu.
25 karththarudaiya Vasanamo Endrendraikkum Nilaiththirukkum; Ungalukkuch Suviseshamaai Arivikkappattuvarugira Vasanam Idhuve.
